text: <!channel>: Hello everyone! Another busy day for Luxo....What would you guys like for lunch today? Maybe we can even venture away from Water Ave....
<@U02618EV1> mentioned chipotle the other day and that sounded pretty good
but also i'm down for w/e
how about thai food?
we ordered some a while back that delivers and was good
let me find the menu if that sounds okay
sounds good 2 me
+1 for Thai
<http://www.maithaiportland.com/>

attachments.text: Experience Portland's Best Thai Food at our new location on SE Belmont. Try our savory soups, mouth watering appetizers, noodle dishes, curries and healthy entrees. If you're in the mood for good Thai food, Mai Thai Restaurant is the place! We Deliver Portland's Best Thai Food : Fresh Ingredients, Lunch Specials, Locally Owned, Delivery service
attachments.fallback: Experience Portland's Best Thai Food at our new location on SE Belmont. Try our savory soups, mouth watering appetizers, noodle dishes, curries and healthy entrees. If you're in the mood for good Thai food, Mai Thai Restaurant is the place! We Deliver Portland's Best Thai Food : Fresh Ingredients, Lunch Specials, Locally Owned, Delivery service

text: <!channel> Can we reboot luxo?
<!channel>
give me just a moment...
k
Sure.
fire away
Hey <@U026PLK4S> do you have a pdf/ai with the new button sizes?
<@U02618EV1> there shouldn't be new assets, we just need to adjust the spacing so that the targets are larger
sorry, i chatted with him after he sent this message. forgot to update thread
Yes, got all my questions answered.
so sorry about the food delay guys. :disappointed: I'm in a meeting but I know Stephanie is/was following up on it.
<@U026PLK4S> Just to confirm, are we also adding the extra padding to the buttons inside the menu? We will make the menu itself wider to house the wider buttons.
ah.
i forgot about those guys
i think we try that, and see how big it makes it (probably pretty big)
maybe it would be worth ditching one of the buttons, like power off
looking good though!
Sounds good. Finishing the video buttons and will share screenshots when all of them are resized.

<@U026PLK4S> Looks like making menu wider is a bit more complex than I thought. Since it sounds like we're not sure this may work (visually), would it be possible to mock this up to see if we want to make the change before I code it?
hah. i already was. I did have to bump the menu out a bit, but not too much.
we'll probably lose that 3rd button though
Cool
also, i wouldn't worry about re-sizing video thumbnails. just pull them off the edge
ok
hold on! we fought for that power button, so I just want to make sure we're collectively agreeing to remove it now.
<@U02E3CRMA>: has the time out been set up? So that it turns itself off after a certain amount of time?
it's been disabled for dev, I can re-enable with the install package
And since we were the ones who fought for the power button, I assume they'll be okay with removing it in the interest of keeping that menu smaller
okay, joel, thanks.
go ahead with the change, gaston, and I'll just shoot Luke a note about it.
Ok. Working on video skip buttons until we get those comps but it should be a quick change after that.
